33  std::lock(m, other.m);
34  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> self_lock(m, std::adopt_lock);
35  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> other_lock(other.m, std::adopt_lock);
36  active = other.active;
37  notified = other.notified;
38  lock = std::unique_lock<std::mutex>(m);
39  return *this;

48  inline void sleep()
49  {
50  notified = false;
51  while (!notified) // loop to avoid spurious wakeups
52  {
53  cond_var.wait(lock);
54  }
55  }
56 
57  inline void wakeUp()
58  {
59  notified = true;
60  cond_var.notify_one();
61  }
